name: Submit
description:
This API is used to:

- Update the transaction status to submitted.
    
- Schedule a poll transaction status from UBX.
    
- Push e-payment update notification.
    

This API will be called by the client/front-end when the user has been successfully authorize the transaction from the bank webview authorization screen.
